content: these seed stitch mittens are so quick and easy to make they are knit in the round using the magic loop method increases are made for the thumb gusset then the thumb stitches are set aside while the hand of the mitten is knitted later the thumb stitches are placed back on the needles and worked in the round a link to a step-by-step video tutorial is included yarn 63 yds/58 m lion brand wool-ease thick and quick in mustard needles us 11/8 mm 29 in/74 cm circular needle or size needed to obtain gauge optional double pointed needles may also be used notions locking stitch markers tapestry needle for weaving in ends scrap yarn gauge 8 5 sts and 18 rounds = 4 in/10 cm in seed stitch sizes one women s medium 8 5 in/22 cm finished circumference unstretched
